name: Fred Perry Slim Fit Polo With Twin Tipped In White
description:
Polo shirt by Fred Perry
  • Breathable pique
  • Tipped polo collar
  • Two button placket
  • Embroidered logo
  • Slim fit - cut closely to the body
  • Machine wash
  • 100% Cotton
  • Our model wears a size Medium and is 185.5cm/6'1" tall
additionalInfo:
Body: 100% Cotton.

SIZE & FIT
Model's height: 6'1”/185.5 cm

brand.name: Fred Perry
brand.description: Fred Perry's authentic menswear collection is heavily influenced by the brand's historical roots in sport and classic, urban menswear. The range, including the iconic slim fit polo shirt, blends British style with the edge and attitude garnered from the brands unique streetwear credentials.

careInfo: Machine wash according to instructions on care label
